note: I'm from BaaaaaaaaarRrrRrRRrRRgrn, Norway! I love free libre open source software AND open hardware, securing privacy and autonomy for all - because of the digital world world we live in. I'm also a recovering distro hopper, I've worked as a sysadmin (or "SysOps" I think it's called today) and I'm currently interested in getting into modern web development.

fields.name: Gaming & production laptop:
fields.value: ASUS  ROGZephyrus GM501GM, Windows 10, dual boot NixOS
